body_html: I don't know if you understand what I mean. If you leave the way it is now, the installation won't work for anaconda users that choose python 3 support because the installation procedure is asking to create a python 3.5 environment and the file is currently called cp34-cp34m. I suggest you change the installation procedure to build a python 3.4 environment or to rename the file to py3-none.

body: I don't know if you understand what I mean. If you leave the way it is now, the installation won't work for anaconda users that choose python 3 support because the installation procedure is asking to create a python 3.5 environment and the file is currently called cp34-cp34m. I suggest you change the installation procedure to build a python 3.4 environment or to rename the file to py3-none.
